00015 /**
00016  * Thrown if an sql-query generates an error
00017  * 
00018  * @package kata_model
00019  */
00020 class DatabaseErrorException extends Exception {
00021 
00022     /**
00023      * contains the query that generated the exception
00024      * @var string
00025      */
00026     protected $query = '';
00027 
00028     /**
00029      *
00030      * @param string $message informational message
00031      * @param mixed $code query string
00032      * @param Exception $previous previous Exception
00033      */
00034     public function __construct($message = null, $code = 0, Exception $previous = null) {
00035         if ((0 !== $code) && is_String($code)) {
00036             $code = trim($code);
00037             if (strlen($code)>1024) {
00038                 $code = substr($code,0,1023).' *snip*';
00039             }
00040 
00041             $this->query = $code;
00042             $message = $message." (SQL '".$code."')";
00043             $code = 0;
00044         }
00045         
00046         parent::__construct($message, $code);
00047     }
00048 
00049     /**
00050      * return query that generated the exception
00051      * @return string
00052      */
00053     final public function getQueryString() {
00054         return $this->query;
00055     }
00056 
00057 
00058 }
